A Virtual Private Server (VPS), also sometimes called a Virtual Dedicated Server or VDS, is a portition of a larger server which acts completely independent, almost identical to a dedicated server — it has its own Operating System, root (master) access, and can be rebooted independently. Below are just some of the reasons why a VPS solutions from ResellerWebHost.co is your best choice.

Semi-Dedicated Servers

A Semi Dedicated Server is a partition of a larger server which acts completely independent, almost identical to a dedicated server — it has its own Operating System, full root access, and can be rebooted independently. We accept all major credit and debit cards securely through PayPal, or you can use your PayPal account. Our PayPal account is a verified business account, so you do not have to have a PayPal account to make payments!

24x7x365 Tech Support:
We offer 24x7 support to our clients via email, forum (for issues that are not urgent), or our client area for issues that are urgent.
